title: Spinach Stir Fry || South Indian Style
content:
Simple recipe with high vitamins and minerals: South Indian recipe Servings: 4 Duration : 10-12 mins Spinach is eaten as a leafy vegetable, it contains 91% of water rest carbohydrates and protein. It is a rich source of vitamins and minerals Vitamin : A, B6, C, E and K Minerals: Magnesium, manganese, iron, calcium and potassium Spinach is available all over world and it's used globally. You can make enumber of variety recipes depends on cuisine. Coming to south India ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³Â we prepare spinach Dal, spinach rice, curries, salad, sandwich etc., Some of the recipes I prepared with spinach/ palak Spinach Dum Biryani/ Palak Dum Biryani Healthy Green Sandwich Spinach-peas Gravy / Palak Mutter Creamy Kadai Cute Veg Canapes Today, I prepared one more recipe with Spinach that is spinach stir fry. It is good combination with Rice and ghee/Â Chapathi/ Roti Let's start with ingredients and follows procedure Ingredients: Spinach - 1 bunch Onion - one medium - finely chopped - 1 cup Masala powder: Roasted chickpea - 2 tb sp Dry coconut powder - 4 tb sp Coriander seeds - 1 tb sp Sesame seeds - 1 tb sp Red chilly powder - 1/2 tb sp Garlic cloves - 2 medium Salt - to taste For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • Heat frying pan on medium heat
  • Add oil, tempering and onion
  • Let it fry for 1-2 minute and saute in between
  • Blend all the mentioned ingredients in Masala Powder.
  • Make smooth powder and keep it aside
  • Wash spinach and chop them
  • Add chopped spinach in pan on low to medium heat
  • Saute 30 secs
  • Add Masala Powder and give it a mix
  • Saute and cook for 2 mins
  • Dish out in a bowl
  • Spinach stir fry is ready to serve
  • Serve it with hot rice & ghee/ pulka/ chapathi/ roti ðŸ˜€
